data.name: How to make data driven decisions using A/B testing
data.summary:
What will be discussed?
Examples on:

How to take decisions based on the results of an A/B test?
How Booking.com does feature rollouts with experimentation
Product A/B testing & what you can test with interactive examples

Things to do before running an A/B test:

Formulating a hypothesis for your test and expected outcome
Deciding on primary and secondary metrics
Calculating the power and runtime of your test
Bonus: Non-inferiority tests
data.speakers: Saurav Roy, Product Manager, Payments at Booking.com
